duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and oversee all alterations fittings, sewing, steaming, pressing, and spot cleaning of garments to company standards.
Train Alterations Specialists in fitting and sewing techniques.

Welcome all customers with genuine and friendly enthusiasm over the phone and in person, communicates clearly and concisely, adapting style to suit customers by problem-solving, excellent phone skills, and resolving conflict.
Assist stylists in closing sales by consulting with customers regarding gown fit and customization.
Maintain quality control guidelines and inspect all garments altered/steamed/pressed to verify pristine condition before final delivery to the customer.
Use all approved systems and processes to manage the customer's flow to deliver a 5-Star Customer Experience.
Promote all alteration services and personalization options.
Communicate daily sales goal achieved to Store Manager.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or degree. Prior sewing experience required, preferably in bridal and/or special occasion production environment. 1-2 years prior retail experience in an apparel or specialty store environment.
